### Segona a Primera

```{r echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
d <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/segaplayoffs.csv")
t <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/teamlist.csv")
names(d)[1] <- "team"
d <- d %>% left_join(t, by = "team") %>% select(-team)
names(d)[3] <- "team"
d <- d %>% left_join(t, by = "team") %>% select(team,final,ascens) %>% arrange(desc(ascens))
names(d) <- c("Equip", "A Final", "Ascens")
kable(d, digits = 1, align = "lcc")  %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T)
```
